研究表明时间细胞在复杂行为学习中的关键作用时间感是我们理解、回忆和与世界互动的基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-the-ritic-role-of-time-cells-in-complex-behavioral-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-the-ritic-role-of-time-cells-in-complex-behavioral-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17fd79a6-79bc-41ab-a2e4-366a953061c7 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 11:30:17 -0400 Study shows the critical role of time cells in complex behavioral learning
围产期抑郁症与女性长期心血管疾病风险较高有关根据今天（周三）发表在《欧洲心脏杂志》上的研究，与未经历过围产期抑郁症的分娩妇女相比，被诊断患有围产期抑郁症的妇女在未来 20 年内患心血管疾病的可能性更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Perinatal-depression-linked-to-higher-long-term-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Perinatal-depression-linked-to-higher-long-term-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eda99ec5-49f5-4be6-b966-874cecaab79d Wed, 19 Jun 2024 11:25:32 -0400 Perinatal depression linked to higher long-term cardiovascular disease risk in women
研究显示长达一年的大重量阻力训练对腿部重要力量的影响一项临床试验的后续结果显示了一项临床试验的后续结果，该试验在线发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open Sport & Movement Medicine 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-effects-of-year-long-heavy-resistance-training-on-vital-leg-strength.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Study-shows-effects-of-year-long-heavy-resistance-training-on-vital-leg-strength.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5109ae3d-09e1-4e46-812d-c89d3f98c416 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 10:13:07 -0400 Study shows effects of year-long heavy resistance training on vital leg strength
紧缩政策导致英国预期寿命下降近半年伦敦政治经济学院 (LSE) 今天（6 月 19 日星期三）发布的一份新工作论文显示，2010 年至 2019 年间，政府的紧缩开支削减导致英国普通人的预期寿命缩短了近半年国际不平等研究所，由伦敦经济学院和伦敦国王学院的研究人员撰写。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Austerity-linked-to-nearly-half-year-drop-in-life-expectancy-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Austerity-linked-to-nearly-half-year-drop-in-life-expectancy-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e27ef934-21d8-474e-acb3-b8e223b43ed3 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 10:06:00 -0400 Austerity linked to nearly half-year drop in life expectancy in the UK
解锁 B 细胞在视神经脊髓炎谱系障碍治疗中的作用自身免疫性疾病目前无法治愈，只能治疗，影响中枢神经系统的视神经脊髓炎谱系疾病也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Unlocking-the-role-of-B-cells-in-neuromyelitis-optica-spectrum-disorder-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Unlocking-the-role-of-B-cells-in-neuromyelitis-optica-spectrum-disorder-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb2e1df1-29d3-496f-a316-69eaacb173bb Wed, 19 Jun 2024 09:47:00 -0400 Unlocking the role of B cells in neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder treatment

个性化大脑回路评分定义六种抑郁和焦虑生物型研究人员利用脑回路功能的功能磁共振成像数据，为焦虑和抑郁患者得出可解释的、个性化的脑回路功能障碍评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Personalized-brain- Circuit-scores-define-six-depression-and-anxiety-biotypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/Personalized-brain- Circuit-scores-define-six-depression-and-anxiety-biotypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92595a74-b9f1-4a74-b491-74c78b49d7d0 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 07:31:00 -0400 Personalized brain circuit scores define six depression and anxiety biotypes

报告显示，四分之一的父母表示，他们的孩子因为担心或焦虑而无法入睡研究结果表明，虽然大多数父母为孩子制定了就寝时间，但许多孩子在就寝时会感到焦虑或不安，五分之一的孩子服用褪黑激素来帮助他们入睡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/1-in-4-parents-say-their-young-child-cane28099t-go-to-sleep-because-of-being-worried-or-焦虑报告揭示.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240619/1-in-4-parents-say-their-young-child-cane28099t-go-to-sleep-because-of-being-worried-or-焦虑报告揭示.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3ff7a5b-74e5-4a8b-9d75-d771ca45c6a9 Wed, 19 Jun 2024 06:47:00 -0400 1 in 4 parents say their young child can’t go to sleep because of being worried or anxious, report reveals
